pli-tv-pvr7:7.1: Atthāpatti saññā vimokkhā, atthāpatti no saññāvimokkhā.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.6: Atthi saccaṃ bhaṇanto garukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, musā bhaṇanto lahukaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.7: Atthi musā bhaṇanto garukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, saccaṃ bhaṇanto lahukaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.12: Atthāpatti ādiyanto āpajjati, atthāpatti anādiyanto āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.13: Atthāpatti samādiyanto āpajjati, atthāpatti na samādiyanto āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.14: Atthāpatti karonto āpajjati, atthāpatti na karonto āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.15: Atthāpatti dento āpajjati, atthāpatti na dento āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.16: Atthāpatti desento āpajjati, atthāpatti na desento āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.17: Atthāpatti paṭiggaṇhanto āpajjati, atthāpatti na paṭiggaṇhanto āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.18: Atthāpatti paribhogena āpajjati, atthāpatti na paribhogena āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.21: Atthāpatti aruṇugge āpajjati, atthāpatti na aruṇugge āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.22: Atthāpatti chindanto āpajjati, atthāpatti na chindanto āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.23: Atthāpatti chādento āpajjati, atthāpatti na chādento āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:7.24: Atthāpatti dhārento āpajjati, atthāpatti na dhārento āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:8.22: attanā vā attānaṃ nānāsaṃvāsakaṃ karoti, samaggo vā naṃ saṃgho ukkhipati adassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:8.24: attanā vā attānaṃ samānasaṃvāsakaṃ karoti, samaggo vā naṃ saṃgho ukkhittaṃ osāreti dassane vā paṭikamme vā paṭinissagge vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:8.27: Dve saṃghādisesā, dve thullaccayā, dve pācittiyā, dve pāṭidesanīyā, dve dukkaṭā, dve dubbhāsitā—
pli-tv-pvr7:9.10: alajjissa ca lajjino ca na yācati.
pli-tv-pvr7:9.17: Dve puggalā abhabbā sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:9.19: Dve puggalā bhabbā sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:9.21: Dve puggalā abhabbā sañcicca sātisāraṃ vatthuṃ ajjhācarituṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:9.23: Dve puggalā bhabbā sañcicca sātisāraṃ vatthuṃ ajjhācarituṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:10.2: kāyena vā paṭikkosati vācāya vā paṭikkosati.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.4: atthi puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṃ tañce saṃgho nissāreti ekacco sunissārito, ekacco dunnissārito.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.6: atthi puggalo appatto osāraṇaṃ tañce saṃgho osāreti ekacco sosārito, ekacco dosārito.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.8: kāyena vā paṭijānāti vācāya vā paṭijānāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.10: kāyena vā paṭiggaṇhāti kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.12: kāyena vā paṭikkhipati vācāya vā paṭikkhipati.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.16: kāyena vā codeti vācāya vā codeti.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.28: kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti vācāya vā adhiṭṭheti.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.30: kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti vācāya vā adhiṭṭheti.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.40: kāyena vā āpajjati vācāya vā āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:10.42: kāyena vā vuṭṭhāti vācāya vā vuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr7:11.4: yo ca anāgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati, yo ca āgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati.
pli-tv-pvr7:11.6: yo ca akappiye kappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye akappiyasaññī.
pli-tv-pvr7:11.8: yo ca akappiye akappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye kappiyasaññī.
pli-tv-pvr7:11.10: yo ca anāpattiyā āpattisaññī, yo ca āpattiyā anāpattisaññī.
pli-tv-pvr7:11.12: yo ca āpattiyā āpattisaññī, yo ca anāpattiyā anāpattisaññī.
pli-tv-pvr7:11.14: yo ca adhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca dhamme adhammasaññī.
pli-tv-pvr7:11.16: yo ca adhamme adhammasaññī, yo ca dhamme dhammasaññī.

pli-tv-pvr7:12.4: yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati.

pli-tv-pvr7:25.1: Atthāpatti tiṭṭhante bhagavati āpajjati, no parinibbute;
pli-tv-pvr7:25.2: atthāpatti parinibbute bhagavati āpajjati, no tiṭṭhante;
pli-tv-pvr7:25.6: atthāpatti kāle ceva āpajjati vikāle ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:25.12: atthāpatti dasavasso ceva āpajjati ūnadasavasso ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:25.15: atthāpatti pañcavasso ceva āpajjati ūnapañcavasso ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.3: atthāpatti bālo ceva āpajjati paṇḍito ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.6: atthāpatti kāḷe ceva āpajjati juṇhe ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.9: atthi kāḷe ceva kappati juṇhe ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.10: Atthāpatti hemante āpajjati, no gimhe no vasse;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.11: atthāpatti gimhe āpajjati, no hemante no vasse;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.12: atthāpatti vasse āpajjati, no hemante no gimhe.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.13: Atthāpatti saṃgho āpajjati, na gaṇo na puggalo;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.14: atthāpatti gaṇo āpajjati, na saṃgho na puggalo;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.15: atthāpatti puggalo āpajjati, na saṃgho na gaṇo.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.16: Atthi saṃghassa kappati, na gaṇassa na puggalassa;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.17: atthi gaṇassa kappati, na saṃghassa na puggalassa;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.18: atthi puggalassa kappati, na saṃghassa na gaṇassa.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.19: Tisso chādanā vatthuṃ chādeti, no āpattiṃ;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.26: brāhmaṇānaṃ mantā paṭicchannā vahanti, no vivaṭā;
pli-tv-pvr7:26.31: tathāgatappavedito dhammavinayo vivaṭo virocati, no paṭicchanno.
pli-tv-pvr7:26.36: atthāpatti gilāno ceva āpajjati agilāno ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:27.11: atthāpatti anto ceva āpajjati bahi ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:27.14: atthāpatti antosīmāya ceva āpajjati bahisīmāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:27.16: kāyena āpajjati, vācāya āpajjati, kāyena vācāya āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:27.20: kāyena vuṭṭhāti, vācāya vuṭṭhāti, kāyena vācāya vuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.1: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho tajjanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.2: bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno gihisaṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.3: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho niyassakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.5: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno gihisaṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.6: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho pabbājanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.8: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno kuladūsako hoti pāpasamācāro pāpasamācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.9: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.11: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno gihī akkosati paribhāsati.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.12: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.14: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ passituṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.15: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.17: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṃ paṭikātuṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:28.18: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kareyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:28.20: saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto, āpattibahulo anapadāno na icchati pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjituṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.1: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṃgho āgāḷhāya ceteyya—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.2: bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno, gihisaṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikehi gihisaṃsaggehi.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.4: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.5: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.6: adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.7: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.8: kāyikena davena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena davena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena davena samannāgato hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.9: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.10: kāyikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena anācārena samannāgato hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.11: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.12: kāyikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena upaghātikena samannāgato hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.13: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.14: kāyikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, vācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti, kāyikavācasikena micchājīvena samannāgato hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.15: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.16: āpattiṃ āpanno kammakato upasampādeti, nissayaṃ deti, sāmaṇeraṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.17: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.18: yāya āpattiyā saṃghena kammaṃ kataṃ hoti taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, aññaṃ vā tādisikaṃ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:29.19: Aparehipi tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno kammaṃ kātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:29.20: buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṃghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.1: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno saṃghamajjhe uposathaṃ ṭhapentassa—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.2: “alaṃ, bhikkhu, mā bhaṇḍanaṃ mā kalahaṃ mā viggahaṃ mā vivādan”ti omadditvā saṃghena uposatho kātabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.3: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.4: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno saṃghamajjhe pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapentassa—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.5: “alaṃ, bhikkhu, mā bhaṇḍanaṃ mā kalahaṃ mā viggahaṃ mā vivādan”ti omadditvā saṃghena pavāretabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.6: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.7: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno na kāci saṃghasammuti dātabbā—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.8: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.9: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā saṃghe na voharitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.10: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.11: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu na kismiñci paccekaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.12: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.13: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno nissāya na vatthabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.14: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.15: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno nissayo na dātabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.16: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.17: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno okāsakammaṃ kārāpentassa nālaṃ okāsakammaṃ kātuṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.18: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.20: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.21: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno vinayo na pucchitabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.22: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.23: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā vinayo na pucchitabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.24: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.25: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno vinayo na vissajjetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.26: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.27: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā vinayo na vissajjetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.28: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.29: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno anuyogo na dātabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.30: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.31: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ vinayo na sākacchitabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.32: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:30.33: Tīhaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ na nissayo dātabbo na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:30.34: alajjī ca hoti, bālo ca, apakatatto ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:33.2: idamappahāya, yo ca abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño, yo ca suddhaṃ brahmacāriṃ parisuddhabrahmacariyaṃ carantaṃ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṃseti, yo cāyaṃ evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi—
pli-tv-pvr7:33.3: “natthi kāmesu doso”ti so kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:33.5: lobho akusalamūlaṃ, doso akusalamūlaṃ, moho akusalamūlaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:33.7: alobho kusalamūlaṃ, adoso kusalamūlaṃ, amoho kusalamūlaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:33.12: Tayo atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā kulesu tikabhojanaṃ paññattaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:33.13: dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, “mā pāpicchā pakkhaṃ nissāya saṃghaṃ bhindeyyun”ti kulānuddayatāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr7:33.14: Tīhi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho pāpicchatā pāpamittatā oramattakena visesādhigamena antarā vosānaṃ āpādi.
pli-tv-pvr7:47.2: adiṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditā, assute sutavāditā, amute mutavāditā, aviññāte viññātavāditā.
pli-tv-pvr7:47.4: adiṭṭhe adiṭṭhavāditā, assute assutavāditā, amute amutavāditā, aviññāte aviññātavāditā.
pli-tv-pvr7:47.6: diṭṭhe adiṭṭhavāditā, sute assutavāditā, mute amutavāditā, viññāte aviññātavāditā.
pli-tv-pvr7:47.8: diṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditā, sute sutavāditā, mute mutavāditā, viññāte viññātavāditā.
pli-tv-pvr7:48.4: atthi parikkhāro rakkhitabbo gopetabbo mamāyitabbo paribhuñjitabbo;
pli-tv-pvr7:48.5: atthi parikkhāro rakkhitabbo gopetabbo mamāyitabbo, na paribhuñjitabbo;

pli-tv-pvr7:49.9: Saha paṭilābhena purimaṃ jahati, pacchime patiṭṭhāti, viññattiyo paṭippassambhanti, paṇṇattiyo nirujjhanti.
pli-tv-pvr7:49.10: Saha paṭilābhena pacchimaṃ jahati, purime patiṭṭhāti, viññattiyo paṭippassambhanti, paṇṇattiyo nirujjhanti.

pli-tv-pvr7:49.33: bhikkhu dussīlo pāpadhammo parisadūsano, bhikkhunī dussīlā pāpadhammā parisadūsanā, upāsako dussīlo pāpadhammo parisadūsano, upāsikā dussīlā pāpadhammā parisadūsanā.

pli-tv-pvr7:50.3: atthāpatti āgantuko ceva āpajjati āvāsiko ca atthāpatti neva āgantuko āpajjati, no āvāsiko.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.6: atthāpatti gamiko ceva āpajjati āvāsiko ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:50.7: atthāpatti neva gamiko āpajjati no āvāsiko.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.8: Atthi vatthunānattatā no āpattinānattatā, atthi āpattinānattatā no vatthunānattatā, atthi vatthunānattatā ceva āpattinānattatā ca, atthi neva vatthunānattatā no āpattinānattatā.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.9: Atthi vatthusabhāgatā no āpattisabhāgatā, atthi āpattisabhāgatā no vatthusabhāgatā, atthi vatthusabhāgatā ceva āpattisabhāgatā ca atthi neva vatthusabhāgatā no āpattisabhāgatā.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.10: Atthāpatti upajjhāyo āpajjati no saddhivihāriko, atthāpatti saddhivihāriko āpajjati no upajjhāyo, atthāpatti upajjhāyo ceva āpajjati saddhivihāriko ca, atthāpatti neva upajjhāyo āpajjati no saddhivihāriko.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.11: Atthāpatti ācariyo āpajjati no antevāsiko, atthāpatti antevāsiko āpajjati no ācariyo, atthāpatti ācariyo ceva āpajjati antevāsiko ca, atthāpatti neva ācariyo āpajjati no antevāsiko.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.13: saṃgho vā bhinno hoti, saṃghaṃ vā bhinditukāmā honti, jīvitantarāyo vā hoti, brahmacariyantarāyo vā hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.15: musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.17: saccavācā, apisuṇā vācā, saṇhā vācā, mantā bhāsā.
pli-tv-pvr7:50.18: Atthi ādiyanto garukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, payojento lahukaṃ;

pli-tv-pvr7:50.20: atthi ādiyantopi payojentopi lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:51.3: atthi puggalo abhivādanāraho ceva paccuṭṭhānāraho ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.4: atthi puggalo neva abhivādanāraho no paccuṭṭhānāraho.

pli-tv-pvr7:51.8: atthi puggalo neva āsanāraho no abhivādanāraho.

pli-tv-pvr7:51.15: atthi paṭiggahitaṃ kāle ceva kappati vikāle ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.16: atthi paṭiggahitaṃ neva kāle kappati no vikāle.
pli-tv-pvr7:51.17: Atthāpatti paccantimesu janapadesu āpajjati, no majjhimesu;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.18: atthāpatti majjhimesu janapadesu āpajjati, no paccantimesu;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.19: atthāpatti paccantimesu ceva janapadesu āpajjati majjhimesu ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.20: atthāpatti neva paccantimesu janapadesu āpajjati no majjhimesu.
pli-tv-pvr7:51.21: Atthi paccantimesu janapadesu kappati, no majjhimesu;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.22: atthi majjhimesu janapadesu kappati, no paccantimesu;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.23: atthi paccantimesu ceva janapadesu kappati majjhimesu ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.24: atthi neva paccantimesu janapadesu kappati no majjhimesu.
pli-tv-pvr7:51.27: atthāpatti anto ceva āpajjati bahi ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.28: atthāpatti neva anto āpajjati no bahi.
pli-tv-pvr7:51.31: atthāpatti antosīmāya ceva āpajjati bahisīmāya ca;
pli-tv-pvr7:51.32: atthāpatti neva antosīmāya āpajjati no bahisīmāya.

pli-tv-pvr7:52.8: chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati.

pli-tv-pvr7:52.12: chandāgatiṃ gacchanto, dosāgatiṃ gacchanto, mohāgatiṃ gacchanto, bhayāgatiṃ gacchanto.

pli-tv-pvr7:52.18: chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati.

pli-tv-pvr7:52.20: chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati.

pli-tv-pvr7:52.22: chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati.

pli-tv-pvr7:63.10: sayaṃ vā kammaṃ na karoti, paraṃ vā na ajjhesati, chandaṃ vā pārisuddhiṃ vā na deti, kayiramāne kamme paṭikkosati, kate vā pana kamme adhammadiṭṭhi hoti.

pli-tv-pvr7:63.53: dinnañca hoti, viditañca hoti, kappiyañca hoti, paṭiggahitañca hoti, katātirittañca hoti.

pli-tv-pvr7:64.1: Pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “bālo” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—

pli-tv-pvr7:64.3: Pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “paṇḍito” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:64.4: attano bhāsapariyantaṃ uggaṇhāti, parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ uggaṇhāti, attano bhāsapariyantaṃ uggahetvā parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ uggahetvā dhammena kāreti paṭiññāya.

pli-tv-pvr7:64.6: āpattiṃ na jānāti, āpattiyā mūlaṃ na jānāti, āpattisamudayaṃ na jānāti, āpattinirodhaṃ na jānāti, āpattinirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ na jānāti.

pli-tv-pvr7:66.9: Aparehipi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nānissitena vatthabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:66.10: āpattānāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ūnapañcavasso hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.12: āpattānāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, pañcavasso vā hoti atirekapañcavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.14: uposathaṃ na jānāti, uposathakammaṃ na jānāti, pātimokkhaṃ na jānāti, pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānāti, ūnapañcavassā hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.16: uposathaṃ jānāti, uposathakammaṃ jānāti, pātimokkhaṃ jānāti, pātimokkhuddesaṃ jānāti, pañcavassā vā hoti atirekapañcavassā vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.17: Aparehipi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatāya bhikkhuniyā nānissitāya vatthabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:66.18: pavāraṇaṃ na jānāti, pavāraṇākammaṃ na jānāti, pātimokkhaṃ na jānāti, pātimokkhuddesaṃ na jānāti, ūnapañcavassā hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.20: pavāraṇaṃ jānāti, pavāraṇākammaṃ jānāti, pātimokkhaṃ jānāti, pātimokkhuddesaṃ jānāti, pañcavassā vā hoti atirekapañcavassā vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.21: Aparehipi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatāya bhikkhuniyā nānissitāya vatthabbaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr7:66.22: āpattānāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ūnapañcavassā hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:66.24: āpattānāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, pañcavassā vā hoti atirekapañcavassā vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:67.2: attāpi attānaṃ upavadati, anuviccapi viññū garahanti, pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:67.4: attāpi attānaṃ na upavadati, anuviccapi viññū pasaṃsanti, kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
pli-tv-pvr7:67.6: appasannā na pasīdanti, pasannānaṃ ekaccānaṃ aññathattaṃ hoti, satthusāsanaṃ akataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ nāpajjati, cittamassa na pasīdati.
pli-tv-pvr7:67.8: appasannā pasīdanti, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya hoti, satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati, cittamassa pasīdati.
pli-tv-pvr7:67.10: anāmantacāre āpajjati, raho nisajjāya āpajjati, paṭicchanne āsane āpajjati, mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desento āpajjati, kāmasaṅkappabahulo ca viharati.
pli-tv-pvr7:67.12: ativelaṃ kulesu saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato mātugāmassa abhiṇhadassanaṃ, dassane sati saṃsaggo, saṃsagge sati vissāso, vissāse sati otāro, otiṇṇacittassetaṃ bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ anabhirato vā brahmacariyaṃ carissati aññataraṃ vā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjissati sikkhaṃ vā paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissati.
pli-tv-pvr7:68.2: mūlabījaṃ, khandhabījaṃ, phaḷubījaṃ, aggabījaṃ, bījabījaññeva pañcamaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:68.4: aggiparijitaṃ, satthaparijitaṃ, nakhaparijitaṃ, abījaṃ, nibbattabījaññeva pañcamaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:68.6: nidānaṃ uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ, ayaṃ paṭhamā visuddhi;
pli-tv-pvr7:68.7: nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ, ayaṃ dutiyā visuddhi;
pli-tv-pvr7:68.8: nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā terasa saṃghādisese uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ, ayaṃ tatiyā visuddhi;
pli-tv-pvr7:68.9: nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā terasa saṃghādisese uddisitvā dve aniyate uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ, ayaṃ catutthā visuddhi;
pli-tv-pvr7:68.12: suttuddeso, pārisuddhiuposatho, adhiṭṭhānuposatho, pavāraṇā, sāmaggīuposathoyeva pañcamo.
pli-tv-pvr7:68.14: attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito, kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti, visārado saṃghamajjhe voharati, paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhāti, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:81.13: Cha āpattiyo kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr7:81.14: Cha āpattiyo vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na kāyato.
pli-tv-pvr7:81.15: Cha āpattiyo kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr7:81.20: Cha vidatthiyo, sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ cha vidatthiyo.
pli-tv-pvr7:81.23: vippakatacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati, vippakatacīvaraṃ samādāya pakkamati.
pli-tv-pvr7:82.1: Chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:82.2: asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena paññakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:83.1: Aparehipi chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:83.2: attanā asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, paraṃ asekkhe sīlakkhandhe samādapetā;
pli-tv-pvr7:83.3: attanā asekkhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, paraṃ asekkhe samādhikkhandhe samādapetā;
pli-tv-pvr7:83.4: attanā asekkhena paññakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, paraṃ asekkhe paññakkhandhe samādapetā;
pli-tv-pvr7:83.5: attanā asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, paraṃ asekkhe vimuttikkhandhe samādapetā;
pli-tv-pvr7:83.6: attanā asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, paraṃ asekkhe vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhe samādapetā;
pli-tv-pvr7:84.1: Aparehipi chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:84.2: saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, upaṭṭhitassati hoti, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:85.1: Aparehipi chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:85.2: na adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, na ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, na atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, bahussuto hoti, paññavā hoti, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:86.1: Aparehipi chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:86.2: paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ vā upaṭṭhāpetuṃ vā, anabhirataṃ vūpakāsetuṃ vā vūpakāsāpetuṃ vā, uppannaṃ kukkuccaṃ dhammato vinodetuṃ, āpattiṃ jānāti, āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:87.1: Aparehipi chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:87.2: paṭibalo hoti antevāsiṃ vā saddhivihāriṃ vā ābhisamācārikāya sikkhāya sikkhāpetuṃ, ādibrahmacāriyakāya sikkhāya vinetuṃ, abhidhamme vinetuṃ, abhivinaye vinetuṃ, uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ dhammato vivecetuṃ, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:88.1: Aparehipi chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo—
pli-tv-pvr7:88.2: āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā.
pli-tv-pvr7:89.1: Cha adhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanāni, cha dhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanānīti.
pli-tv-pvr7:97.2: āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
pli-tv-pvr7:98.1: Aparehipi sattahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti—
pli-tv-pvr7:98.2: āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
pli-tv-pvr7:99.1: Aparehipi sattahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti—
pli-tv-pvr7:99.2: āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
pli-tv-pvr7:100.1: Aparehipi sattahaṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti—
pli-tv-pvr7:100.7: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe—
pli-tv-pvr7:100.8: “amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ;
pli-tv-pvr7:100.9: tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno”ti iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati;
pli-tv-pvr7:100.10: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti—
pli-tv-pvr7:100.11: “ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā, vacīduccaritena samannāgatā, manoduccaritena samannāgatā, ariyānaṃ upavādakā, micchādiṭṭhikā, micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā, ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā, vacīsucaritena samannāgatā, manosucaritena samannāgatā, ariyānaṃ anupavādakā, sammādiṭṭhikā, sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti;
pli-tv-pvr7:100.12: āsavānañca khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.

pli-tv-pvr7:113.1: Aṭṭhānisaṃse sampassamānena na so bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-pvr7:113.2: Aṭṭhānisaṃse sampassamānena paresampi saddhāya sā āpatti desetabbā.
pli-tv-pvr7:113.8: Aṭṭhahi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
pli-tv-pvr7:113.23: Aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūrentiyā desitāpi adesitā hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:113.31: Tassapāpiyasikākammakatena bhikkhunā aṭṭhasu dhammesu sammā vattitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:113.32: Aṭṭha adhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanāni aṭṭha dhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanānīti.
pli-tv-pvr7:120.18: tīṇi dhammikāni dānāni, tayo dhammikā paṭiggahā, tayo dhammikā paribhogā.
pli-tv-pvr7:127.1: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “bālo” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:127.2: attano bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhāti, parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ na uggaṇhāti, attano bhāsapariyantaṃ anuggahetvā parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ anuggahetvā adhammena kāreti, appaṭiññāya āpattiṃ na jānāti, āpattiyā mūlaṃ na jānāti, āpattisamudayaṃ na jānāti, āpattinirodhaṃ na jānāti, āpattinirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ na jānāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:128.1: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “paṇḍito” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:128.2: attano bhāsapariyantaṃ uggaṇhāti, parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ uggaṇhāti, attano bhāsapariyantaṃ uggahetvā parassa bhāsapariyantaṃ uggahetvā dhammena kāreti, paṭiññāya āpattiṃ jānāti, āpattiyā mūlaṃ jānāti, āpattisamudayaṃ jānāti, āpattinirodhaṃ jānāti, āpattinirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:129.1: Aparehipi dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “bālo” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:129.2: adhikaraṇaṃ na jānāti, adhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ na jānāti, adhikaraṇasamudayaṃ na jānāti, adhikaraṇanirodhaṃ na jānāti, adhikaraṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ na jānāti, vatthuṃ na jānāti, nidānaṃ na jānāti, paññattiṃ na jānāti, anupaññattiṃ na jānāti, anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:130.1: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “paṇḍito” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:130.2: adhikaraṇaṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇassa mūlaṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇasamudayaṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇanirodhaṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānāti, vatthuṃ jānāti, nidānaṃ jānāti, paññattiṃ jānāti, anupaññattiṃ jānāti, anusandhivacanapathaṃ jānāti.
pli-tv-pvr7:131.1: Aparehipi dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “bālo” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:131.2: ñattiṃ na jānāti, ñattiyā karaṇaṃ na jānāti, na pubbakusalo hoti, na aparakusalo hoti, akālaññū ca hoti, āpattānāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ācariyaparamparā kho panassa na suggahitā hoti na sumanasikatā na sūpadhāritā.
pli-tv-pvr7:132.1: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “paṇḍito” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:132.2: ñattiṃ jānāti, ñattiyā karaṇaṃ jānāti, pubbakusalo hoti, aparakusalo hoti, kālaññū ca hoti, āpattānāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā sūpadhāritā.
pli-tv-pvr7:133.1: Aparehipi dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “bālo” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:133.2: āpattānāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, āpattānāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, adhikaraṇe ca na vinicchayakusalo hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:134.1: Dasahaṅgehi samannāgato vinayadharo “paṇḍito” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati—
pli-tv-pvr7:134.2: āpattānāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, āpattānāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukagarukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, sāvasesānavasesaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, adhikaraṇe ca vinicchayakusalo hoti.
pli-tv-pvr7:135.2: Dasa atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr7:135.25: Dasavassena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena pabbājetabbaṃ upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
pli-tv-pvr7:135.26: Dasavassāya bhikkhuniyā byattāya paṭibalāya pabbājetabbaṃ upasampādetabbaṃ nissayo dātabbo sāmaṇerī upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
pli-tv-pvr7:135.27: Dasavassāya bhikkhuniyā byattāya paṭibalāya vuṭṭhāpanasammuti sāditabbā.
pli-tv-pvr7:144.1: Ekādasa puggalā anupasampannā na upasampādetabbā, upasampannā nāsetabbā.
pli-tv-pvr7:144.20: Mettāya cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya ekādasānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
pli-tv-pvr7:144.21: Sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, manussānaṃ piyo hoti, amanussānaṃ piyo hoti, devatā rakkhanti, nāssa aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamati, tuvaṭṭaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati, mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdati, asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, uttari appaṭivijjhanto brahmalokūpago hoti—
pli-tv-pvr7:144.22: mettāya cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya ime ekādasānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhāti.
